creditline: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. John E. Larkin, Jr.
medium: Black crayon and graphite on paper
provenance: The artist, New York (until d. 1925); his wife, Emma S. Bellows, New York (1925-d. 1959); estate of Emma S. Bellows; [H.V. Allison & Co., New York; sold to Larkin]; John and Colles Larkin, Dellwood, Minnesota (until 1988; given to MIA).
title: The White Slave
